title: Block Stack - React Native Mobile Application Developer
desc: Worked on Paycircle application by using this user can transfer crypto as well as Usd to each Other
Developed crypto wallet where user can import their assets for respective Blockchains
Integrated Trade Module in Paycircle application where users can buy and sell Different Cryptocurrencies
summery: I was an integral part of the development team working on the Paycircle application, a versatile platform enabling seamless transactions in both cryptocurrencies and traditional fiat currencies. Additionally, I played a key role in developing a sophisticated crypto wallet system. This innovative wallet allowed users to import and manage their diverse range of assets across various blockchain networks, ensuring a streamlined and secure process for asset management within the Paycircle ecosystem.
